channel.title: Faraz Rahman on Rotational Labs
channel.description: Recent content in Faraz Rahman on Rotational Labs

item.title: Unlocking Real-Time Insights for Data-Driven Success
item.description: Profitable businesses rely on their own data to grow, make smart choices, and delight their customers. Easier said than done! While a batched approach can provided limited success, real-time data analytics often give better ROI.
